attributes.action: Dissolve the government until after article 50 date. They do not represent Uk
attributes.additional_details: The uk government have failed the uk people for the last time. We the public formally request that the queen step in dissolve parliament and trigger a fresh election after April 1st 2019. She should step in and end relations between the British gorvernment and the EU negotiation team and force the break away that was democratically voted for.
attributes.background: The time has come for the uk to formally request the dissolution of parliament from the queen and seek to form a gorvernmt after the article 50 deadline date. The current uk government have lost the majority of support from the uk citizens. All political parties should be forced to campaign again.
